values:
Oooooooh, yeeeeeaaaaaahh, baby!


As you may all have recalled (scroll down on previous message) I wanted to move. But there were complications so here I am, with so much to tell and fully loaded with stories and such!!!

Take note of changes. I'm going to edit as much as I can with all this shit and (this is spicy to the tongue) i might swear a lot more than recommended.

I'm moooooving!!! I'm starting a new Journal, blogspot.

Link:  http://theflawedperfection.blogspot.com


Wheeeeeee! I also need help how to do stuff and all....


Nia

Bella's suggesting me to move to Blogger. I'm still thinking about that, but incase I move, I'll post the address here.

Nia

I have been missing for a long time.

Long story short, internet's bad. Improvision senses tell me to use the PC's in school. The Christmas Vacation's over,  and we have all gone back to school. Are ya ready for three more months of sickening doom?

I'm sure not.

This is just about the new background. I might change it again, or keep it. Please comment on the background, and you guys can suggest.

Cheers, breadstick men.

Last night, I had this..dream. here's how it goes.


Me, Bella and Eri were given this map, and we had to look for two places of opposite ends (east and west). The first place we went to was this old abandoned Haunted House, with two ghosts: a guy and a girl, who'd kill both good and evil. So we tried to get rid of it. Thing is, we got rid of the house too, using thing big giant whilwind.


The second place was a swamp, with a bridge over it. Below the bridge was a pool of anacondas (and you could tell they were anacondas) with lotsa eggs. bella and me fell in that gunk of sloppy snake and frog swapy mess. (she stepped on a stillborn) and then at the end of the bridge was this giant pitviper and two turtles covered in wormy moss.


Cool, eh?
I'm back to updating!!! I'm gonna keep posting w/o rich text because the PC recieves an error with it.

Due to personal delay, this journal will be suspended until further notice. Inqueries through comments will be ignored while suspension is in progress. Thank you.


Sincerely,
Account Owner: Nia Redavni

11 days till Halloween

Yes, me! I know I haven't been updating for a loooooong time. Internet's faulty, so I'm using the school PC.

Me and my folk's watched Shark Tale. Ever since Home on The Range, Disney's closing all cartoon animation productions and all their future works would be three dimensional. At least, that's what they told me.

Dad got new DVD's, and I watched iRobot. Iz cool! There's this group of robots called the NS-5. Fast, but sensitive. I love the part where Sunny fights the other robots.


Oooh, and I realized that I missed this old animation called The Nightmare Before Christmas. Spooky and fun.




That's all

You're like a fairy. Fairies were the little pixies
that usually lived in the forest with wings
like butterflies and perfect little faces.
they had brown or blonde hair and pale skin
with freckles. They were entergetic, joyful,
playful, very smart, and peaceful. Fairies are
deffinately the most famous of all fantasy
creatures. (If you cannot see the picture, go
to my userpage and look near the bottom. There
should be the picture and description for all
the results)

What's Your Element? (for gurls) (PICS)
brought to you by Quizilla e Besides the fact that I stayed at Eri's house coz my mom was asleep and too sick to get up, I have nothing else to share.

I've decided to write as often as i can, if possible, everyday. But that's gonna be kinda hard, with all the school pressure and stuff. Currently I'm feeding myself as much stimulant sugar as possible to keep me awake. Bad news, I've grown immune to my coffee-'n'-soda combo. Horrid news, it made my sleeping pattern go haywire. I slept through Chemistry and Trigonometery yesterday, and damn we had a new lesson. Weird thing, I understood it... o_o. How, I have no idea (mental note: Get off the stuff. It's like marijuana, for Goodness sake)

And I'm back to posting in bbrp. If you have no hell idea what it is, follow these steps:

1. Direct eyes towards link panel

2. Click "rubber piggy" link

If unable to locate, contact journal user.

The homepage wil you give you a general idea what it's about.

 

 

That's all

Nia

Why I didn'y update last night, I do not know o_o. Probably coz I had one HELL of a party last night. And damn, it was awesome!!! Eri, my bestest best best friend came over, and we had fun. She liked my room, and she took pics to show Bella.

We played with this frosted chess set. It went fine at first, but the intellectual challenge brought us to insanity. We ended up with a draw. In ches, it takes sixteen moves to draw. i thought Eri would do something unexpected at the count of "fifteen". She gave it all up. Hey, I don't blame her. The game was chasing away our sanity, anyway. Hell, we were already insane in the first place.

She was also struggling with my mouse. It wouldn't move, or it would skip a step. She told me to get an optical one. Wonder how much those things cost?

Then Eri had this funny cold. You know that feeling when you couldn't say anything properly because your nose is all clogged up? I placed Eri through a series of tests, to see if her nose was okay. I made her say "nick a nack o' nooky nanny" and she said "dick a dack o dooky daddy". She's fine right now, if you're wondering what happened to her.

Then my cousin kay came over, and well, there was an awkward pause betwwen Eri and her. It closed in a few moments

And DAMN, there was an earthquake! I felt it when we took Eri home. It was...unusually shakey and all. It was damn cooooool!!! That was my first earthquake expirience. I made a poem about that through YM with Bella:

 

And the everything else was moving....

and you look on floor

see it still no more

And the eyes of fear

bring more than a tear

When the earth shakes

and trhe ground breaks

Find cover to flee

Set excitement free

 

Yeah. That pretty much was it.

It was one hell of a party. And coz of that, I woke up late. Hehe.

 

 

Nia

Today is the daaaaaaaay!!!! it's da's big party! Family, medreps, other people I dunno, and especially... ERI!!! YAY! She came to my party and saw stuff. She also got to walk Saszie, meh dog. Hehe. The party hasn't started, so I'll update maybe later again to tell all about it.

 

 

Nia

It's OCTOBER!!!! Yeeehah! Damn, it's been so long since I last updated.

We got new DVD's, so I've been watching LOTR 3 for a few while, getting sucked into the world of insanity where people speak the tongue twist blah blah of Elvish and all that crap. We got Jersey Girl, and I wanna see Liv Tyler there. I only know her as an elf from Rivendell, who's Aragorn's chick. The snog at the end, which was predictable.

I go like "Aawwwwww"...

They're a cute couple, but I don't like it when Elrond gets in the way.

He's like "don't you stick with that boy, young lady!" to Arwen.

And Arwen will go "Dammit, dad, I'm a thousand years old! I can handle this kind of thing!"

And meanwhile, on the other side of Middle-Earth Legolas, Aragorn and Gimli go into this mountain thingy.

And Legolas goes all spooky-like. "This mountain has spooky ghosts and we're all gonna die!!!!!"

That reminds me of the time, in LOTR2, where Aragorn and Legolas were bickering in Elvish.

Aragorn was giving encouragement, like, "We can win this! YAY!"

And then Legolas, being the spooky elf he is, goes, "We're dead. Dammit, we are dead. These people are doomed"

And then Aragorn gets pissed off. He goes, "Watchoo talkin' about? Man, you're spoilin' everything"

So they bicker out loud in elvish.

Aragorn starts shouting, "MAN, WHAT THE HELL IS WRONG WITH YOU?!?!?!? ARE YOU ON OUR SIDE OR ARE YOU GONNA BRING DOOM TO US ALL?!?!??!"

And then Legolas freaks out like hell and goes, "WHAY THE HELL ARE YOU PUSHIN' THEM TO FIGHT, HUH?!?!? HUUUUUUUUH?!?!?"

And he prods Aragon on the chest with every "HUH?!?!?!?!?"

Soon they meet up after silence. Aragorn goes beside Legolas and goes. "Hey"

And Legolas replies, "Hey"

"We're still Best Friends, right?"

"Yup. Friends! Sorry for being poopy"

And then they hug. Hehe, just kidding. They DON'T.

Those two are the best best friends that liven up the movie. My fav characters. Actually, I like it when they talk. NOt in elvish. They give me a headache when they do.

 

 

NIA

Last night I finally got to watch Stephen King's The Dreamcatcher, and manwas it exciting. It wasn't scary, just plain weird. You kow, lots of alien crap with alien things and alien...stuff...

 

Anyway, then I had two separate dreams after the movie. The first one was an HP dream. I was in Hogwarts, in a classroom, crying (why I was crying, I have NO idea). Then I hear these voices coming. They tried to open the classroom, but the door was barricaded with things. The crowd outside was a group of Gryffindors and Slytherins. I knew coz of the patches on their robes. They were shouting that they needed this particular classroom. But I didn't let them in.

Then Draco Malfoy comes out of the crowd and starts banging his fists on the door and the windows.

"Get out, mudblood! Get out!" He said.

Draco crashed through the window and grabs my leg. He drags me outside the room, opens the door and lets everyone inside. After that, he picked a fight with me.

I left him, saying "Go away, child. Go away"

 

The second dream was in this weird modern house. There were nightcrawlers everywhere, and I couldn't seep well coz they were in my bed. Then, like in SIMS, I poked them and there these trangle things above their heads, and they started goingwhere I wanted them to go. Weird.

 

 

Ooh, I forgot to mention. I had a teensy HP dream. It was like a flash of it. Molly Weasley had a Black Mamba, and she was having trouble transfering it to an aquarium.

 

That's all.

Today might be my busiest Saturday. I gotta do my Trig Homework, algebra homework, clean my room, graph my term (don't ask), and do other things that I don't have time mentioning.

 

 

I'll update again later, after I do all my stuff. :D

Yaaaay! Issa Friday night! Oh, lotsa free time and joy. This morning I felt like crap, now I feel relaxed. Anyways, this afternoon, there was this applicant that was trying out for the Chem position (as you all know, Ms. Finis is gone).

 

The girl's name was...eh...I forgot, but she could have been a good teacher if she didn't stutter so much. Probably coz she's new, and she's nervous.

 

But no one'll ever replace Ms. Finis. NOOOOOO OOOOOONNNNEEE.

 

(Don't you DARE make fun of her name)

I forgot to tell the tale of the most PERFECT Chemistry Teacher in my History of Living. Her name's Ms. Finis, and she's moving to Manhattan, New York. In human terms, she's perfect: Smart, funny, pretty, disciplined, kind (in a way).

 

She was the only decent person in the staff! And now, she'll be spending twelve hours on a 747 Continental with Plane food for lunch, breakfast and dinner, CROSS the International Date Line, land on New York with all that food about to explode into her throat and prepare for her new job in the great US of A!!!!

 

 

 

....

 

 

 

I'm gonna miss her.

Today, Eri told me that a group of Feng Shui practicing people came over to her house to do a little "Chi" rearangement. According to her, her dad was the one who invited them over. Eri refused her room to be touched, and the people said her room was fine. Well, almost. her stuff toy rats were "bad" for them and all. I've been to her room and I luvd that rat.

 

 

If my parents had them over, they better stay away from MY room coz if they take away even ONE stuff toy, I'd mutilate their heads off. Though I doubt my parents will have them over. They don't believe in that Feng Shui shit.

 

Thank Goodness Christianity doesn't require furniture arrangements. The twelve disciples didn't need to have their room fixed to get a miracle during the Pentecost (probably coz there wasn't any furniture in that room 0_o). All THEY had to do was pray.

 

So what would YOU rather have? Simple prayer to get God's help or two million permutations on furniture positions to get good luck?

 

Hell, forget luck! Cross black cats for all I care. I'm sticking to God.

(Feng Shui IS kinda a witch-ish thing. Right?)

Okay, I really don't have time to tell everything that happened in the past few days. It's the middle of the night, and mum wants me to sleep. Long story short:

 

No outreach, I got transferred. Dana got a duckling, I made a comic, talumpati, no shoes, spontanious speech, dorky outfit, finished, came home, watched the matrix, deja vu, black cat, Amazing Race 5, Manila Philippines, Grandma, soup for dinner, multiplication table, and my brother.

Those are the things that happened in the past few days.

We had our recollection today, and there were....

 

...

 

some horrible things. See, here's how it goes:

On a paper, draw a boat on water and a shark that's REALLY hungry, fat and would eat ANYTHING. So, you're family's in the boat, and you're the captain. Then, the boat starts to sink, and you need to throw someone out (who, may I add, will 200% be eaten and be torn to shreds by the stupid shark) And the others will be perfectly safe. The THING that irked me was that you couldn't throw yourself out.

THAT was stupid!!! I was the captain, wasn't I?!?!?!? I decide what happens to the passengers! If I say they live, they live! I'm already sacrificing shark-induced pain and they EXCLUDE me from it?!?!?!? How does limiting my options benefit in the situation, IF I AM THE CAPTAIN AND  I SAY WHAT HAPPENS TO MY FAMILY!?!?! How are THEY gonna stop me from jumping off the ship, huh?! HUH?!?!?! HUH?!?!?!?!?!?

 

...

 

 

...

 

 

I feel much better now

I promised myself to clean my room, yet here I am suck in front of the PC surfing. Maybe I'll get started on it this afternoon. If not, I'll do it on Sunday. Fever's not gone yet. Maybe that's the reason why I feel lazy cleaning my room. :)

ooh, i found out this morning that i have a fever, my head hurts and my throat is burning like hell. the wild thornberries the movie cheered me up. Yeah, it was alright. kinda short (i think) but yeah, it will do....

The fever's very moderate, and mu,m told me to bathe to see if it would go away.

 

Guess what?

 

It grew worse. She said to call her if it did. i haven't called her, but i will soon. I just need to clean my room first coz it smells like burning wood and incence ashes. Trust me, it smells like death. (Not the stinky kind of smell. It's that black-mood-someone's-gonna-die smell)

 

NIa

This is my first log. And ya know what? I'm proud of it. Here I go....

*is proud*

Thank you to Bella who helped me go through this, by the way. I owe you loads.

-NIa
